description: A mountain on Dawn Island where Curly Dadan's hideout is located and where young Luffy, Ace, and Sabo spent their childhood hunting and training.

keyEvents.title: Brothers Hunt Together
keyEvents.description: Ace, Sabo, and Luffy hunt a Danpa in the forest of Mt. Colubo.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the brothers' daily routine and teamwork.

keyEvents.title: Bear Attack
keyEvents.description: A powerful bear attacks the three brothers while they're hunting.
keyEvents.significance: Creates the situation that introduces Naguri.

keyEvents.title: Naguri Appears
keyEvents.description: Naguri makes his first appearance in the forest of Mt. Colubo, saving the brothers from a bear.
keyEvents.significance: Introduction of an important anime-original character.

statusHistory.reason: Mt. Colubo remains an active location throughout the flashback arc

description: The mountain bandits' hideout where Curly Dadan and her gang live, and where Luffy and Ace stayed during their childhood.

keyEvents.title: World Noble Visit Discussed
keyEvents.description: Dadan discusses with Dogra and Magra the upcoming visit of a World Noble to Goa Kingdom.
keyEvents.significance: Foreshadows the events that will lead to the Gray Terminal fire and Sabo's fate.

statusHistory.reason: The hideout is operational during this episode

description: A massive junkyard on the outskirts of Goa Kingdom where the kingdom's trash and unwanted people are dumped. Home to Bluejam Pirates and many vagabonds.

keyEvents.title: Outlook III Meets Bluejam
keyEvents.description: Sabo's father Outlook III visits Gray Terminal to meet with Bluejam and arrange for Sabo's retrieval.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the plot that will lead to major events including the Gray Terminal fire.

statusHistory.reason: Gray Terminal exists as a junkyard
